## Introduction

```{r introduction}
library(owmr)

owm_cities %>% head()

ls("package:owmr") %>% data.frame(obj = .)
```

## Installation

```{r installation, eval=F}
require("devtools")

devtools::install_github("crazycapivara/owmr")
```
